questions.quote: I can't stand these guys. You give your number to them and then they don't call. Why do they do that?
Yeah, oh, I do too. This guy could be a little bonkos. Really. Anyway, if you will, would you please welcome: Kramer!
And it's their anniversary Friday night. I could send them for a hansom cab ride. Y -- you think they'd like that?
Oh, nothin' much, . . . talkin'. . . . Oh, oh, oh, did I have an unbelievable idea today!
Well, I could care less. I hope it is on our record. I'm just sorry they didn't lock me up.
Well, I don't know... h- how long have you been shaving your head for?
Oh sure, it just doesn't have any of the thrills of the Cougar.
I didn't take the subway all the way to New York to sit at a table like that!
Hey, uh, Milos, I don't mind rolling over here, but could you lighten up on the 'not a man' stuff?
Course you know there is always the possibility, that she called an audible.
